title: Special gazette on repatriation of export proceeds into Sri Lanka issued
body_lines: Foreign earnings from all exported goods and services supplied overseas are mandatory to be remitted to Sri Lanka within 180 days after shipment or provisioning of services, a Gazette Extraordinary issued by the Central Bank Governor says.
The communique, titled Repatriation of Export Proceeds into Sri Lanka Rules No. 1 of 2022, was published on Friday (March 11).
